subject: Math
goals: Understand the concept of limits and the fundamental principles of differential calculus.
milestones: By the end of the week, students should be able to define and calculate limits and understand the concept of a derivative.

learning_tasks.task: Introduction to limits - Watch a video on limits and continuity.
Read textbook section on limits and introduction to derivatives.

practice_tasks.task: Solve problems involving calculating limits from the textbook or online resources.
Complete exercises on identifying derivatives from a set of simple functions.

resources: Khan Academy: Calculus for understanding limits, Textbook: Chapter on Limits and Derivatives, any calculus online exercises platform.
